channel.title: [667] Need Some Great Ideas [667] - [READ ASAP] 6.4.2013
channel.description:
Hello, If you are [b]interested[/b] in a player idea based [b]RSPS[/b] please tell me your suggestions/feedback on what the server should be like:
-minigames -events -the staff -updates -what you wanna see -unique content -and any other suggestions
[size=9pt][b]Also if you do not have anything nice to say or just here to flam / spam please ignore this topic and do not reply.[/b][/size]
Thanks in advance ! :) -[b]Emptyone999[/b]

item.title: [667] Need Some Great Ideas [667] - [READ ASAP] 6.4.2013
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

-minigames

gnomeball would be a nice minigame to see in a rsps

-events

don’t do events players think they need rewards…

-the staff

who says you need any?

-updates

listen to the community but keep in mind about the eco EVERYTHING factors in

-what you wanna see

be a competent owner, listen to the community

-unique content

again, listen to the community you will be surprised what your players will see. Also keep up to date on bug reports so that way when they see you fix the bugs they will be like “hey he isn’t an idiot! Maybe we should suggest stuff!”

-and any other suggestions

babymaking skill

Read full topic
